ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly take on a distinctly sheep-like shape by growing out and narrowing down into long, slightly-folded ovals. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] experimentally [npc.verb(twitch)] [npc.her] new sheep-like ears back and forth.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSheep(sheep-like ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of #IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF sheep-like ears, which are positioned high up on [npc.her] head and are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
